SongName: Way Back Into Love (Demo Version) - demo
Album: Music and Lyrics (Music from the Motion Picture)
Lyric:
[by:三文线]
[ti:Way Back Into Love]
[ar:Hugh Grant and Drew Barrymore]

[00:00.02] Hugh: "Way back into love, take one." 
[00:02.43] Drew: "Oh God, I'm getting really nervous." 
[00:06.06] Hugh: "You'll be fine, just use your normal, nice voice 
[00:07.99] that I've heard so much over the last three days." 
[00:10.56] Drew: "It's like my throats closing up 
[00:12.23] it's like anaphylactic." 
[00:14.34] Hugh: "It's fine it's just a three minute song." 
[00:16.18]
[00:20.55] Drew(sung softly):
[00:20.65] "I've been living with a shadow overhead 
[00:25.51] I've been sleeping with a cloud ..."
[00:26.99] Hugh:  "Just a little bit louder 
[00:27.97] 'cause this song is intended for humans. OK?
[00:30.55] way back into love take two."
[00:34.35] (Drew) I've been living with a shadow overhead 
[00:39.09] I've been sleeping with a cloud above my bed
[00:43.91] I've been lonely for so long
[00:48.00] Trapped in the past, I just can't seem to move on
[00:53.12] (Hugh) I've been hiding all my hopes and dreams away
[00:58.31] Just in case I ever need 'em again someday
[01:03.11] I've been setting aside time
[01:07.19] To clear a little space in the corners of my mind
[01:13.28] (Both) All I wanna do is find a way back into love
[01:22.83] I can't make it through without a way back into love
[01:30.52] Ohhhhh
[01:36.64] (Drew) I've been watching but the stars refuse to shine
[01:41.36] I've been searching but I just don't see the signs
[01:46.47] I know that it's out there
[01:50.12] There's got to be something for my soul somewhere
[01:55.18] (Hugh) I've been looking for someone to shed some light
[01:59.95] Not somebody just to get me through the night
[02:04.55] I could use some direction
[02:09.30] And I'm open to your suggestions
[02:14.49] (Both) All I wanna do is find a way back into love
[02:23.80] I can't make it through without a way back into love
[02:31.15] And if I open my heart again
[02:35.91] I guess I'm hoping you'll be there for me in the end
[02:41.97] (Drew Laughing)
[02:46.31] Hugh:  "Oh for heaven's sake!"
[02:48.29] Drew:  "That's your serious Oh, Oh, Oh Face."
[02:50.76] Hugh:  "I know I can work with that much 
[02:51.83] that is my Rock n' Roll face 
[02:53.90] millions of women find that very sexy, 
[02:56.62] are you promise ? R U?... Oh, OK."
[03:00.46] (Drew) There are moments when I don't know if it's real
[03:05.38] Or if anybody feels the way I feel
[03:10.43] I need inspiration
[03:14.51] Not just another negotiation
[03:20.74] (Both) All I wanna to do is find a way back into love
[03:30.06] I can't make it through without a way back into love
[03:37.49] And if I open my heart to you
[03:42.05] I'm hoping you'll show me what to do
[03:46.75] And if you help me to start again
[03:52.23] You know that I'll be there for you in the end
[03:59.73]
